Package components

Class Board

java.lang.Object
components.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Name: Kevin Zhang Teacher: Mr. Anandarajan Date: 06-07-2020 Description: Game Board class containing a 7x6 grid.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Direction constants.

    static char[][] grid
    Grid containing the position of the chips.
    static int[] tops

  • Field Details

    • grid

      public static char[][] grid
      Grid containing the position of the chips. Listed in reverse-order vertically (row 0 is the bottom of the grid).

    • tops

      public static int[] tops
      Array containing the highest position of a chip in each column of the grid.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()

  • Method Details

    • placeChip

      public static boolean placeChip​(int column, char colour)
      Places a chip in a set column if possible and updates the Game Loop.
      Parameters:
      column - the column.
      colour - the colour of the chip.
      Returns:
      true if a chip was placed.

    • connect4

      public static boolean connect4​(int r, int c, char colour)
      Checks if there is a 4-in-a-row or more at a position.
      Parameters:
      r - the row.
      c - the column.
      colour - the colour to check.
      Returns:
      true if there is a 4-in-a-row.

    • canMove

      public static boolean canMove()
      Checks if the board is full.
      Returns:
      true if at least 1 column is open.

    • longestInARow

      public static int longestInARow​(int r, int c, char colour, boolean requireStartingCellColour)
      Checks the longest in a row at a position. There is an option to require or ignore the colour of the given cell.
      Parameters:
      r - the row.
      c - the column.
      colour - the colour.
      requireStartingCellColour - if the first cell needs to contain the chip with the given colour.
      Returns:
      the length of the longest, continuous line of the given colour at the position.

    • longestInARow

      public static int longestInARow​(int r, int c, char colour, boolean requireStartingCellColour, Board.Direction... directions)
      Checks the longest in a row at a position in the given directions. There is an option to require or ignore the colour of the given cell. Note: the lengths in all given directions will be summed up.
      Parameters:
      r - the row.
      c - the column.
      colour - the colour.
      requireStartingCellColour - if the first cell needs to contain the chip with the given colour.
      directions - the directions to consider.
      Returns:
      the length of the longest, continuous line of the given colour at the position.

    • getDistanceToClosestChip

      public static int getDistanceToClosestChip​(int r, int c, char colour)
      Gets the distance to the closest chip of a given colour.
      Parameters:
      r - the row.
      c - the column.
      colour - the colour of the chip.
      Returns:
      the distance, or -1 if none.

    • logGrid

      public static void logGrid()
      Prints the grid to the console.
